itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Daniel "Dan" Pascoe (7 July 1900 – 19 May 1971) born in Llanharan, was a Welsh rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1920s. He played representative level rugby union (RU) for Wales, and at club level for Bridgend RFC and Neath RFC, captaining both, as a flanker, i.e. number 6 or 7, and club level rugby league (RL) for Leeds, he died in Leeds
